name: Kasi Majji

shortBio: Passionate Data Scientist with expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and data engineering. Solving complex problems through data-driven approaches.
aboutMe:
From insurance analytics to real-time ML systems — building data solutions that drive clarity, action, and impact.

Hello! I'm Kasi Majji, a Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer based in Chicago, IL. With 2.5+ years of experience.

It didn't start with a dream of becoming a data scientist. It all started with questions. How does Google Photos group faces so perfectly? How do Netflix seem to know what I exactly I Like?  That curiosity slowly turned into passion. I began exploring data, writing code, running models — not because I had to, but because I genuinely loved uncovering insights hidden beneath the surface. Over time, what started as a spark became a full-blown path.

I joined Tata Consultancy Services, where I worked with insurance data. I was helping solve real problems, ones that impacted people and decisions every day. Later, I pursued a master's in information systems at Northern Illinois University to deepen my technical and strategic thinking. That journey gave me the space to experiment, build real-time ML pipelines, explore cloud systems, and bring ideas to life.

My work lies at the intersection of ML Pipelines, MLOps, and AI — deploying real-time, scalable systems on the cloud. Whether it's cleaning up messy data or deploying production-grade models, I love being hands-on and close to the problem.
